title: Hair Growth Supplement for Longer, Stronger, Healthier Hair by Success Chemistry - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Unlock the secret to longer, stronger, and healthier hair with Hair Growth Supplement by Success Chemistry. This advanced formula combines essential vitamins, minerals, and botanical extracts tailored to support hair growth while reducing hair loss. Infused with key ingredients like Biotin, Collagen, and Saw Palmetto, this supplement offers comprehensive support for your hair, ensuring vibrant, luscious locks. Key Benefits:
  • Promotes Hair Growth: Formulated with Biotin, Collagen, and Keratin to encourage thicker, longer hair.
  • Reduces Hair Loss: Saw Palmetto and Nettle Root work to balance hormones, minimizing thinning and shedding.
  • Enhances Hair Strength: Strengthening nutrients fortify each strand, reducing breakage for healthier hair.
  • Nourishes Hair Follicles: Botanical extracts like Horsetail, Fo-Ti, and Bamboo Extract deliver essential nutrients for optimal hair growth.
  • Comprehensive Support: A holistic blend ensures your hair remains vibrant and healthy.
Ingredients:
  • P-Amino Benzoic Acid (PABA): Supports hair pigmentation and health.
  • Horsetail Extract: Rich in silica to strengthen hair.
  • Fo-Ti: Promotes anti-aging and hair growth benefits.
  • Bamboo Extract: Contains silica for hair strength.
  • Saw Palmetto: Blocks DHT, reducing hair loss.
Achieve luscious, healthy hair naturally with Success Chemistry's Hair Growth Supplement! Incorporate Success Chemistry's Hair Growth Supplement into your daily routine to support longer, stronger, and healthier hair. Experience the comprehensive benefits of our advanced hair health formula and achieve the beautiful hair you desire naturally.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support hair growth and reduce hair loss with Success Chemistry's Hair Growth Supplement. Our formula includes Biotin, Collagen, and botanical extracts for longer, stronger, and healthier hair. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin A (as Beta-carotene) 120 mcg RAE 13%
Vitamin C (as Ascorbic acid) 120 mg 133%
Vitamin D (as Cholecalciferol) 20 mcg 100%
Vitamin E (as D-Alpha tocopheryl acetate) 14 mg 93%
Thiamine (as Thiamine mononitrate) 6 mg 500%
Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCl) 8 mg 471%
Folate 1,496 mcg DFE 374% (880 mcg Folic Acid)
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin) 12 mcg 500%
Biotin 5,000 mcg 16,667%
Pantothenic Acid (as D-Calcium pantothenate) 30 mg 600%
Calcium (Calcium Carbonate) 80 mg 6%
Iron (as Ferrous fumarate) 14.5 mg 81%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Oxide) 120 mg 29%
Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 7 mg 64%
Manganese (as Manganese amino acid chelate) 4 mg 174%
Potassium (as Potassium gluconate) 94 mg 2%
Proprietary Blend: 359 mg **
P-amino Benzoic Acid (PABA), Horsetail extract (Equisetum arvense L.) (Whole herb), Fo-Ti (Polygonum multiflorum) (root), Bamboo extract (Phyllostachys viridis) (leaf), Stinging Nettle (Urtica dioica L.), Chinese Peony (Paeonia lactiflora) (root), Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis) (whole plant), Saw palmetto (Serenoa repens) (fruit), Plant sterols (from Soy Bean) (Glycine max) (seed), Alfalfa (Medicago sativa) (herb), Barley grass (Hordeum vulgare L.) (whole herb)

** Daily Value (DV) Not Established

Other Ingredients: Rice Flour, Hypromellose (Vegetable Capsule), Magnesium Stearate (vegetable), Silicon dioxide. Contains: Soy
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
